Description: Papyrus from the Book of the Dead of Mehmuthat, chantress of Amun, painted with black and red ink with a vignette only with short legends, with black outline figures in registers.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381296) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381296)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: loss, insect attack Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Sized Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Sandwich: board Binding: cloth (loose) Binding: scotch magic tape Object Priority: B Mount Priority: B Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: good (but holes at edges and damage at right edge)
